text: Va az [mijoni] mardum kase hast, ki Allohro ʙo tardid meparastad [va imonas zaif ast], pas, agar xajre ʙa u ʙirasad, [dilas] ʙa on orom megirad [va ʙar imonas ʙoqi memonad] va agar ʙaloe [ʙaroi ozmois] ʙa u ʙirasad, ru megardonad [va ʙa kufr ʙozmegardad]. U dar dunjo va oxirat zijon kardaast. In hamon zijoni oskor ast
